___UserManagerID.description: ID for the Endpoint of a Service managing users in this UserDomain

___PolicyID.description: IDs for Policies associated with this UserDomain

___MappingPolicyID.description: IDs of MappingPolicies associated with this UserDomain

___Member.description: Identifiers for users in this UserDomain

___ParentDomainID.description: The ID of the UserDomain that this UserDomain participates in

___ChildDomainID.description: IDs of UserDomains aggregated by this UserDomain

___AccessPolicyID.description: IDs of AccessPolicies associated with this UserDomain

___Level.description: the number of hops to reach the root of the hierarchy of UserDomains
